Headline: #55N 55th/Narragansett Temporary Reroute at Garfield/Meade
ShortDescription: 55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Garfield/Meade.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#55N 55th/Narragansett buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 55th, Austin, Archer, Narragansett, and 55th over normal route, due to street blockage near Garfield/Meade.

Allow extra travel time.
